SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.Gui.guiControllers

Class Board_C

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.view.Gui.guiControllers.Board_C
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class Board_C extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
This class governs the GUI of the game board where libraries, object cards grid and different types of goal cards are present. It is used as an intermediary between the fixed parts of the GUI of the 'Board.fxml' file and the dynamic information that the controller sends to the graphic components of the following fxml files: "CommonGoal.fxml", "Grid.fxml", "Library.fxml", "PersonalGoal.fxml" and "Point.fxml". In addition, the class manages the interaction between players and the various graphic components of the scene.
Author:
Alberto Aniballi,, Francesco Lo Mastro, Riccardo Figini, Andrea Ferrini

      public Board_C()

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL url, ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
      This method is used to initialize the controller of the "Board.fxml" GUI. In particular, it sets the graphic components in the correct locations and starts the grid, libraries and personal goal cards initialization.
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
      Parameters:
      url - the url used to resolve relative paths for the root object, or null if the location is not known.
      resourceBundle - the resources used to localize the root object, or null if the root object was not localized.

    • updateGrid

      public void updateGrid(ObjectCard[][] grid)
      This method is used to update object cards grid on the main board, its main responsibilities are to set object card to cell of the grid and to update the grid once a player choose object cards from the grid.
      Parameters:
      grid - : the current grid;

    • updateLibrary

      public void updateLibrary(ObjectCard[][] library, String username)
      This method is used to update player libraries of the main board, its main responsibilities is to set to update the library once a player choose object cards from the grid.
      Parameters:
      library - : the current library of the player;
      username - : the name of the library owner;

    • onAskMove

      public void onAskMove()
      This method is used to activate the possibility of a player to choose object cards from the grid during its turn. Once a player has chosen object cards two cases are possible: the case in which an invalid number of object cards is chosen or the case in which the player is directed to the "ColumnInsertionQuestion" stage.

    • runAMove

      public void runAMove(ObjectCard[][] library, String name, Position[] oldInGrid, Position[] newInLibrary)
      This method is used in the case the player make a valid object cards choice from the grid. In particular, the method manages the transition of chosen object cards from the grid to the player library.
      Parameters:
      library - : the player library;
      name - : player name;
      oldInGrid - : the positions of the cards chosen from the grid;
      newInLibrary - : the positions of the cards inserted in the library;

    • resetBorderInGrid

      public void resetBorderInGrid()
      This method is used to reset object cards border to black in the grid.

    • openChat

      public void openChat()
      This method is used to manage players' clicks on the "open chat" button present in the board. It makes the chat appear.

    • showCentralPoints

      public void showCentralPoints(int centralPoints)
      This method is used to show central points in the "centralPointCard".
      Parameters:
      centralPoints - : the number of points;

    • almostOver

      public void almostOver(AlmostOverMessage arg)
      This method is used to enter the phase in which the game is almost over.
      Parameters:
      arg - : the almost over message;

    • initCommonGoalPoints

      public void initCommonGoalPoints(int card1, int card2)
      This method is used to set common goal cards points.
      Parameters:
      card1 - : first common goal card points;
      card2 - : second common goal card points;

    • updatePoints

      public void updatePoints(CommonGoalMessage arg)
      This method is used to update common goal cards points in the case a player reaches common goal objective.
      Parameters:
      arg - : common goal message;

    • setPlayersPoints

      public void setPlayersPoints(ArrayList<Couple<String,Integer>> playersPoints)
      This method is used to set each player points.
      Parameters:
      playersPoints - : the array containing the mapping of each player to its points;

    • setupAnimationChatButton

      public void setupAnimationChatButton()
      This method is used to set up the chat button animation.

    • notifyMessage

      public void notifyMessage()
      This method is used to activate the chat button animation.
